column4: he guys my laptops run ubnunti great. one has 256 and one 380 mb. Bth have similair CPUs. Both are aged t same way. When i run firefox, azureus (any ther bittorrent) and firefox my system becomes slow until freezing point. since both system has the same prblem it has to by ubuntu.  anyone knows about this problem?

and it doesn't happen if you don't do torrents?
sounds like a networking problem then.  don't know what to say :-/
